title: NFL ATL: Week 11 preview, TNF recap
itunes:title: NFL ATL: Week 11 preview, TNF recap
description:
A room full of heroes, Gregg Rosenthal, Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Chris Wesseling give you a full Week 11 preview and break down the top games to watch. The crew also recaps all of the action from NFL Network’s “Thursday Night Football” matchup between the Indianapolis Colts and Tennessee Titans. Also, don’t miss the gang’s hero picks this week. Join the conversation on Twitter: @NFL_ATL or #NFLATL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
